entry.title: [GRA2][Infrastructure] - Electrical background work Room G243 A&B
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 6, 21:00 UTC  -  Mar 7, 00:00 UTC

Jan 29, 10:55 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure.

This will affect availability of your servers.

Start time : 06/03/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 07/03/2025 00:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers will be unavailable during the maintenance operation.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our products and services, we will carry out an electrical upgrade in our Graveline Datacenters. To protect your data from any impact, we advise you to first restart your machines in rescue mode (How to activate and use rescue mode) before the operation mentioned above.

Every client concerned by this maintenance will be contacted.

Thank you for your understanding.
